channel.title: Could someone make me a npc speaking like this code
channel.description:
he's npc id is : 2994
he says : use your dramen staff on purple portal to begin!
could someone send me the speaking code I put in NPChandler
Many Thanks James.

item.title: Could someone make me a npc speaking like this code
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2994) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "use your dramen staff on purple portal to begin!"; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Could someone make me a npc speaking like this code
